name: shorten
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to become shorter or to make something shorter

example.eg: As you grow older, your spine shortens by about an inch.
example.egtrans: 随着年龄变老，你的脊柱将缩短约1英寸。

example.eg: I've asked him to shorten my grey trousers.
example.egtrans: 我已经请他把我的灰色裤子改短一些。

example.eg: The name William is often shortened to Bill.
example.egtrans: “威廉”这个名字经常被简称为“比尔”。
